Hi, guys. How long does compiling the ke: how long is a piece of string.
depends on a whole host of stuff, CPU speed, bus speed, ram amount, drive speed, drive seek time, amount of modules
there is no real answer, people use time to time their compiles and it varys wiildly from 20 mins or so for 8 core cPU with 64Gb RAM to a few days on a Pent 200MMX with 64Mb RAM
check compile times online, expecting us to know is kinda a bit much, you may get slightly more luck in #gentoo
